privacy.title: Privacy Policy & SMS Terms
privacy.body:
## 1. Information We Collect

We may collect the following information when you contact us:

*   Name
*   Phone number
*   Event details (date, location, type of event)

## 2. How We Use Your Information

We use your information solely to:

*   Communicate about booking DJ services
*   Confirm event dates and details
*   Respond to service inquiries
*   Provide customer support

We do **NOT** use SMS for marketing or promotional campaigns.

## 3. SMS Communications & Consent

By providing your phone number, you consent to receive SMS messages related to:

*   Booking confirmations
*   Event coordination
*   Service-related questions

### SMS consent is obtained verbally.

When a customer contacts us or books our services, we verbally ask for permission to communicate via SMS regarding their event.

### Example verbal consent language:

“Do you agree to receive text messages from us regarding your DJ booking and event details? Message and data rates may apply. You can reply STOP at any time to opt out.”

## 4. No Marketing or Third-Party Sharing

We do **NOT**:

*   Send marketing or promotional text messages
*   Sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties
*   Share SMS consent with third parties for marketing purposes

Your information is used strictly for service-related communication.

## 5. Data Security

We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access or disclosure.

## 6. Opt-Out

You may opt out of SMS communications at any time by replying: **STOP**

For help, reply: **HELP**

## 7. Contact Information

Phone: (877) 587-5857

Website: www.hananelmusic.com

***

# SMS Terms & Conditions

By providing your phone number and verbally consenting, you agree to receive SMS messages from DJ HAN.

## Types of Messages You May Receive:

*   Booking confirmations
*   Event reminders
*   Event coordination messages
*   Equipment rental confirmations
*   Service-related updates

Messaging frequency may vary depending on your event and communication needs.

Message and data rates may apply.

To opt out at any time, text: **STOP**

For assistance, text: **HELP** or visit our website at www.hananelmusic.com.

We do not send marketing messages and do not share your information with third parties.
